casebody.data:
STATE ex rel. Ross McCAA v. STATE of Louisiana. No. 98-KH-0473. Supreme Court of Louisiana. July 2, 1998. Reconsideration Denied Aug. 28, 1998.

Prior report: -So.2d-.

In re McCaa, Ross; — Plaintiffs); applying for supervisory and/or remedial writs; Parish' of St. Martin, 16th Judicial District *908Court, Div. “B”, No. 91-1273; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, No. KW97-0822.

Denied. La.C.Cr.P. art. 930.8; State ex rel. Glover v. State, 93-2330 (La.9/5/95), 660 So.2d 1189.

MARCUS, J., not on panel.
